name: Sunland Town
description:
Sunland Town

Welcome to Sunland Town 🌞 a serene and mystical walking simulator. Explore a captivating world as you search for hidden items, unlock secrets, and immerse yourself in the beauty of this unique town!

Features

  • Day or Night: Explore the cozy town in either full daylight or during a mystical night 🌳
  • Hidden Treasures: Find scattered items and reveal the town's secrets 🧩
  • Immersive Soundscapes: Experience ambient sounds that deepen your connection to the world 🎶
  • Relaxing Gameplay: Unwind and reflect, escaping the chaos of daily life 🧘
  • Unique Art Style: Admire hand-painted visuals that bring the town to life 🎨
  • Self-Discovery: Explore your inner self while discovering the town's hidden depths 🌄
